Ar Noy07313j6cqqa3gk1uh7mlrpx4h77pw5w8o5sa1608382014-09-28T17:47:18ZSer Patrek25358400[[Image:Ar Noy.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Ar Noy on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Ar Noy''' is a ruined city on the continent of [[Essos]]. It is located on the banks of the River Qhoyne, not far north from where it joins the [[Rhoyne]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ar Noy was once a great city of the [[Rhoynar]] kingdom ruled by Nymeria. Like most of the other Rhoynar cities, it was destroyed by the [[dragons]] of [[Valyria]] approximately one thousand years ago.
